Reviews.Title: tm506 flip phone
Reviews.Author: Larry Smotrys
Reviews.Content: sony ericsson tm506 is an excellent phone if you want a flip phone.  these are the only phones I use.

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson TM506 GSM Tri-band Phone (Unlocked) Emerald
Reviews.Author: natalie daniel
Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE IS THE WORSE, IT NOT KEEPING CHARGE ,IT CUT OFF IN BETWEEN OFTEN, MY CUSTOMER BROUGHT IT BACK VERY UPSET AFTER WAITING FOR IT A LONG TIME

Reviews.Title: my green greatness
Reviews.Author: elizabeth beckham
Reviews.Content: i love everything about this phone it is easy to read and to work does everything i want from a phone with out all the gadgets

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: jono
Reviews.Content: The product arrived sooner than I expected, 5 star for great service. Product arrived according to the descriptions, except for the battery which is a generic brand. Phone is excellent. Battery is good.

Reviews.Title: Grat Phone
Reviews.Author: Kamran Siddiqi
Reviews.Content: This is the best flip phone available it functions exactly like a semi smartphone. Great phone to purchase. You should buy this phone. It is perfect for someone who wants a cheap phone but with great features.

ProductInfo.Features:
TFT, 256K colors
Secondary external monochrome display, 36 x 128 pixels
35 MB Card slot and Memory Stick Micro (M2)
GPRS and EDGE
SMS, MMS, Email, Push Email and IM messaging
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson TM506 GSM Tri-band Phone (Unlocked) Emerald
